agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 9:35 AM, Thursday, April 18, 2019 PLACE: 3W.9 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia HR 1160 Parker Urging Congress to unite in bipartisan support for the ratification of the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement. HCR 13 White | et al. Designating February 15 as Career and Technical Education Letter of Intent Signing Day for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. referred business Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor.
